name: docs-generator
description: Professional document generation plugin with One Thousand branding. Generates scope documents, hackathon debrief documents (DOCX), hackathon presentations (PPTX), sprint design plans (Confluence), proposals, and client-facing deliverables from hackathon summaries and project briefs. Includes confidence-scored content, iterative quality review, and anti-hallucination verification. Supports English and German.
